name: Deeper Palette
description: Try to reach boss by solving mysterious puzzles with your unique ability:  Color Codes.  Be an amazing art warrior and earn all Colors of The Depth.  Controls: Move: WASD Aim: RMB(hold) Throw Spear: RMB(release) Pull back: RMB(after throw spear) Melee Attack: LMB Color codes: 1-5 number keys (not numpad) Credits Code: Tahir Çağrı, Burak Kayalak, Eray Baran İnan, Mehmet Gökhan Bulat, Mehmethan Sargın, Safa Dedeakay, Şevval Katırcı, Furkan Ceylan Design: Arif Mertcan Kara,Fatih Kökçüler  Art: Dilara İşman, Fatih Kökçüler, Gökdeniz Duyar,Samet Acer Audio: Hasan Akça,Kardelen Eren Erdinç
